visual_description.hat: Tall blue sorcerer hat (Fantasia/Mickey style) with gold crescent moon and stars
visual_description.face: Rugged wizard with strong jaw, intense glowing eyes, full gray beard
visual_description.body: Muscular build, dark purple robes with shoulder armor plates, gold chest emblem and belt buckle
visual_description.staff: Wooden staff with glowing cyan crystal orb, magic particles
visual_description.style: Battle mage aesthetic - imposing and powerful, matches inferno demon detail level

idle.description: Standing neutral pose, staff held upright

walk.description: Walking cycle - alternating feet, arms swing, slight head bob

death.description: Hit recoil → collapse with blood spray → corpse in blood pool

frame_descriptions.0: idle - standing neutral, staff upright, hat tall and proud
frame_descriptions.1: walk1 - left foot forward, arms swing opposite, slight head dip
frame_descriptions.2: walk2 - right foot forward, arms swing opposite, head returns
frame_descriptions.3: death1 - head separating from body, neck stump spraying blood, guts starting to emerge from torso wound
frame_descriptions.4: death2 - full explosion, head flying away, body splitting apart, guts and intestines flying everywhere, massive blood spray
frame_descriptions.5: death3 - scattered remains in gore pool, decapitated head in blood, guts strewn everywhere, ribcage exposed, body chunks scattered

death_details.death1: Decapitation begins - head separates with visible neck stump and spine, blood sprays from severed neck, torso wound opens with guts emerging
death_details.death2: Full explosion - body splits in two, intestines and organs flying outward, head tumbles away, massive gore spray
death_details.death3: Final gore state - head lying in blood pool, intestines spread across ground, ribcage visible, limbs scattered, hat and staff broken nearby
